item.title: Heartburn or Something More? How to Tell the Difference

item.title: Subtle retinal changes identified in early stages of type 2 diabetes
item.description: Texture analysis can identify retinal changes during early stages of type 2 diabetes, according to a study published in Eye Vision.

item.title: Twice-Yearly Asthma Biologic Gains UK Approval
item.description: The MHRA has approved depemokimab as an add-on treatment for severe asthma and chronic rhinosinusitis with nasal polyps. Medscape News UK

item.title: Ministers Promise Urgent Care Focus in NHS Dental Reform
